    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractNoteQuery<R>
extends TaggingCoreItemQueryDefinition<R,NoteQueryParameters>
    This query definition represents queries for notes.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
